>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE===== <<

>>===== RESULT =====>>

<<===== RESULT===== <<

    "id": 246,
    "type": "chapter",
    "multi": {

        "title": {

        }
      }
    },
    "title": "Hello",
